ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Add an escalation policy to a team
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Add an escalation policy to a team
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Add an escalation policy to a team.
A team is a collection of Users and Escalation Policies that represent a group of people within an organization.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#teams)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Add an escalation policy to a team

Add an escalation policy to a team. A team is a collection of Users and Escalation Policies that represent a group of people within an organization. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#teams)

Method: Put

OperationID: updateTeamEscalationPolicy

EndPoint:

/teams/{id}/escalation_policies/{escalation_policy_id}
